answers.answer: Hi,thanks for the query,Blood sugar level of 141 before food is a matter of concern as the incidence of juvenile onset diabetes is rising, please maintain a regular follow up with her doctor and follow up with treatment if necessary as proper treatment can prevent the onset of complications such as vision disturbances, nervous system disease and kidney disease.Wish your daughter good health

question: Need help!  Daughter age 11 has a sugar level of 141 before a meal.  She had an end of school party today and had a bowl of ice cream.  She has been feeling sick ever since.  She also has Celiacs disease and IgA deficiency.  We were told about 3 months ago to monitor her because she is borderline diabetic.  Should I be worried about her sugar level of 141?
title: Sugar level too high???
